sections.heading: Assignor and assigneeAn incorporeal right which has been assigned, whether unconditionally or conditionally for purposes of collection or security, shall be enforced judicially by:(1) The assignor and the assignee, when the assignment is partial; or(2) The assignee, when the entire right is assigned
sections.text: Assignor and assigneeAn incorporeal right which has been assigned, whether unconditionally or conditionally for purposes of collection or security, shall be enforced judicially by:(1) The assignor and the assignee, when the assignment is partial; or(2) The assignee, when the entire right is assigned.
